BodyName: Committee on State and Federal Legislation

Items.Title: Communication from the Mayor – “AN ACT to amend the New York city charter, the education law, the general municipal law, the labor law, the public authorities law, and the New York city health and hospitals corporation act, in relation to providing for employment opportunities for economically disadvantaged candidates and economically disadvantaged region candidates and apprenticeship utilization on public transactions; and providing for the repeal of such provisions upon expiration thereof”. (S.7387B/A.7677).
Items.ActionName: Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.ActionText: This Mayor's Message was Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.MatterName: Providing for employment opportunities for economically disadvantaged candidates and economically disadvantaged region candidates and apprenticeship utilization on public transactions. (S.7387B/A.7677)

Items.Title: Communication from the Mayor – “AN ACT to amend the tax law, the administrative code of the city of New York, chapter 877 of the laws of 1975, chapter 884 of the laws of 1975 and chapter 882 of the laws of 1977, relating to the imposition of certain taxes in the city of New York, in relation to postponing the expiration of certain tax rates and taxes in the city of New York”. (S.7386/A.7667)
Items.ActionName: Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.ActionText: This Mayor's Message was Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.MatterName: Imposition of certain taxes in the city of New York, in relation to postponing the expiration of certain tax rates and taxes in the city of New York”. (S.7386/A.7667)

Items.Title: AND SUCH OTHER BUSINESS AS MAY BE NECESSARY
Items.MatterName: AND SUCH OTHER BUSINESS AS MAY BE NECESSARY

Items.Title: State Legislation Resolution requesting the New York State Legislature to pass bills introduced by Senator Gounardes, S.5678, and Assembly Member Pheffer Amato, A.7414, “AN ACT to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to health insurance coverage for surviving spouses or domestic partners of members of the New York city fire department”.
Items.ActionName: Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.ActionText: This SLR was Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.MatterName: Health insurance coverage for surviving spouses or domestic partners of members of the New York city fire department. (S.5678/A.7414)

Items.Title: State Legislation Resolution requesting the New York State Legislature to pass bills introduced by Senator Gounardes, S.6877, and Assembly Member Pheffer Amato, A.7311, “AN ACT to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to dual retirement system membership in the New York city teachers’ retirement system, the New York city employees’ retirement system, and the New York city board of education retirement system”.
Items.ActionName: Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.ActionText: This SLR was Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.MatterName: Dual retirement system membership in the New York city teachers’ retirement system, the New York city employees’ retirement system, and the New York city board of education retirement system. (S.6877/A.7311)

Items.Title: State Legislation Resolution requesting the New York State Legislature to pass bills introduced by Senator Jackson, S.7509, and Assembly Member Pheffer Amato, A.7668, “AN ACT to amend the retirement and social security law, in relation to updating certain death benefit provisions of the New York city employees’ retirement system, the New York city teachers’ retirement system, and the board of education retirement system of New York city to ensure continued compliance with the federal older workers’ benefit protection act”.
Items.ActionName: Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.ActionText: This SLR was Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.MatterName: Updating certain death benefit provisions of the New York city employees’ retirement system, the New York city teachers’ retirement system, and the board of education retirement system. (S.7509/A.7668)

Items.Title: Communication from the Mayor – “AN ACT to amend the New York city charter, the education law, the public housing law and the New York city health and hospitals corporation act, in relation to construction and mentoring programs; and providing for the repeal of certain provisions upon the expiration thereof”. (S.7526  Comrie /A.7673-A)
Items.ActionName: Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.ActionText: This Mayor's Message was Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.MatterName: Construction and mentoring programs; and providing for the repeal of certain provisions upon the expiration thereof”. (S.7526/A.7673-A)

Items.Title: State Legislation Resolution requesting the New York State Legislature to pass bills introduced by Senator Gounardes, S.7289-A, and Assembly Member Pheffer Amato, A.7679, “AN ACT to amend the general municipal law, in relation to including thyroid cancer in the list of cancers presumed to be incurred in the performance of duty for purposes of disability retirement.”
Items.ActionName: Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.ActionText: This SLR was Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.MatterName: Including thyroid cancer in the list of cancers presumed to be incurred in the performance of duty for purposes of disability retirement. (S.7289-A/A.7679)

Items.Title: Communication from the Mayor – “AN ACT to amend the New York city charter, the education law, the general municipal law, the labor law, the public authorities law, and the New York city health and hospitals corporation act, in relation to providing for employment opportunities for economically disadvantaged candidates and economically disadvantaged region candidates and apprenticeship utilization on public transactions; and providing for the repeal of such provisions upon expiration thereof”. (S.7387B/A.7677).
Items.ActionText: A motion was made that this Mayor's Message be P-C Item Approved by Comm approved by Roll Call.
